front.title: RADIUS attributes for Domain-specific Key Request and Delivery

abstract.t: This document specifies the Key-Request and Key-Response attributes in Remote Authentication and Dial-In User Service (RADIUS). These attributes can be used by a visited network entity to request a key from the home network and the home domain to deliver the key to the visited network entity; the request and response may be piggy-backed on the EAP authentication or EAP Re-authentication bootstrapping exchange between the user and the user's home RADIUS server or may be part of a separate exchange.
